content: st from each side of the sleeve so that 16 st dpn1 and dpn2 12 st each dpn3 are still in stand-by for the second sleeve 16 = 40 st per row knitting in the round starting from the sleeve junction row 2 to 12 k40 dpn1 k12 from the spare needle using a set of slight thinner needles dpn2 k4 more from the spare needle row 13 to 16 repeat k1 p1 20 times there should be 32 st on the spare needle now cast off the 40 stitches and cut the yarn leave the next 16 st on the spare needle in stand by at 4-6cm 2 -3 and slip the 16 last st to dpn3 back to dpn2 which is already 4 st cast on 4 more stitches for the armpit and k4 from dpn3 dpn2 is now 12 dpn3 k12 and pick up 4 stitches from the sleeve to avoid holes you might have to pick up one or two extra stitches that you can knit together with the next one to keep the correct number 4 sleeve we are going to use the last 16 stitches from the spare needle now dpn1 k8 dpn2 k5 dpn3 k3 pick up 4 stitches from armpit as for the other armpit to avoid holes you might have to pick up one or two extra stitches that you can knit together with the next one to keep the correct number and k3 from dpn1 dpn1 and dpn2 are now 5 st dpn3 is 10 knitting in the round please follow the previous sleeve instructions from row 1 to the end 5 finish please take your time for that last step it would be very sad to ruin all the work with a poor finish using a tapestry needle darn all the yarns carefully on the inside make sure there are no holes at the armpits froggybug 2024 mini jumpers english version 3//6 2024 design suggestions froggybug 2024 mini jumpers english version 4//6 froggybug 2024 mini jumpers english version 5//6 froggybug 2024 mini jumpers english version 6//6
